name: Arcane Guardians
description:
Our energy is being corrupted. Can you assemble and gear a team in time?

Arcane Guardians is a challenging strategy game and may take a few tries to succeed. As we balanced it, we had these strategies in mind:

  • Don't be afraid to run old missions to farm loot and energy
  • Don't forget to train your heroes as you have extra energy
  • Make for the blacksmith to turn extra loot into energy
  • Hover over the success chance to see insights on your party formation
